body: There needs to be a check here that the python function returned the correct number of outputs. Otherwise, the interpreter will just crash. (the right number is op->outputs().size(), cache it before the lambda).
body_html: There needs to be a check here that the python function returned the correct number of outputs. Otherwise, the interpreter will just crash. (the right number is op->outputs().size(), cache it before the lambda).
